response.overview: Produced by the Elmina Castle museum, the documentary focuses on Elmina Castle's role in the slave trade, the legacy of Portuguese colonialism, and the thousands of Africans who spent their last nights on the African continent before being shipped to the Americas.
response.tagline: All need to see this. All need to learn from this. So together we make the world a better place.
response.title: Elmina Castle & The Slave Trade
